description: Black Sheep Regenerative Resource Management is an initiative focused on improving the agricultural value chain by acting as an aggregator for local farmers. They aim to provide fair compensation and support for producers, particularly in growing ginger and turmeric. By connecting farmers to international markets and emphasizing responsible production, Black Sheep seeks to create a sustainable business model that benefits both the environment and local communities, while also addressing the challenges posed by cheaper global competitors.
name: Black Sheep
